_sText:
This is the second map I made, and I hope you find it a fun map to play on small GunGame servers...

Description:

Small, fast paced, map made particulary for GunGame servers.
Set in a sunny and bright small fort, with a little bit of fog.

-Supports up to 32 players (though it is really a small map for that)
-Hiding area's under the stairs with viewpoint on the tunnel.
-Hiding area in the attic with viewpoints over the courtyard.
-Walls of 64 units height for optimal headshot-height.
-Several ways including: small stairs to the left, big ladder in the middle (leading to either the top, or middle level) and a tunnel leading to the other sides spawn.

Note: The name gg_fort_infi came from the player Infi whom I made this map for. I used TeamViewer to let him watch through the basics of the HammerEditor. Thus don't expect too much from this map, other than fast paced, short death-time, killing action!
